entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
